Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Simbosan
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, nice room at good prices. Do NOT under any circumstances eat at the a la carte restaurant. Dreadful food, shocking service. Awful awful. Cannot comment on the buffet as we didn't try that. Also, don't be fooled by the 'Harbour View' bit, we had an excellent view of the back of the next building.

Reviews.Title: “Good view and Clean”
Reviews.Author: KBRCS
Reviews.Content: Space is a premium in Hong Kong so storage space in the rooms is limited but there was a good area to hold the luggage for easy access during our stay. The mezzanine floor was nice as it had a few tables, easy chairs and served good food and drinks away from the main restaurant. Nice and peaceful and it had free Wi-Fi. Get a room with a view of the Harbour if you can, if you use Flight Centre to sort your trip out you will automatically get a Harbour view room.

Reviews.Title: “Where did the harbour go?”
Reviews.Author: tourismplanner
Reviews.Content: Don't expect a harbour view, 50% of the rooms face onto the rear of adjecent buildings while the harbour itseld continues to recede into the distance as reclamation marched ever onwards to Kowloon;s shoreline. That said a clean and well located hotel in Wanchai altthough it should be avaoided by handicapped visitors as accessing Wanchai proper required negotiating elevated footbridges Rooms are bright, clear and generously sized by HK standards, services however have not moved with the times internet access in charged and there is no wifi. The restaurants were a particular disappointment the main restaurant featured a buffet which had been completemy booked offer guests no space which the Mezz Retaurant is a rather bleak and souless spaces offering a mediocre menu.

Reviews.Title: “value for money”
Reviews.Author: akky1981
Reviews.Content: I have stayed thrice during my business trip. I have enjoyed my stay and most the harbour view from the room. its offers good breakfast and offers almost all services a five star can offer. now it has become more expensive but still its value for money. I usually stayed here during exhibition which is peak time for hotels there so most of them are expensive but i think it can be found cheaper during off season.

Reviews.Title: “Nice View”
Reviews.Author: tuttifruity67
Reviews.Content: Nice view. Very clean. Within walking distance to many sites. But other than that, The room was small, the bed was hard as a rock and they didnt have many ammenities. If you are looking for a nice view for a good price and you walk so much every day that you are to exhausted to notice the hard bed or you won't be spending a lot of time in your room, then it is a good choice.

HotelInfo.Name: China Harbour View Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: No.189 Gloucester Road, Wanchai, Hong Kong, China
